com.schlimm.forkjoindip
Class ForkAndJoinProcessor<A extends ForkAndJoinTaskPrototype<?>>

java.lang.Object
  com.schlimm.forkjoindip.ForkAndJoinProcessor<A>
Type Parameters:
A - the original ForkJoinTask in charge of the computation (for recursive invocation)
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericSplitProcessor
public abstract class ForkAndJoinProcessor<A extends ForkAndJoinTaskPrototype<?>>
extends Object

Abstract class that isolates the logic how a list of input objects can be distributed across multiple threads using ForkJoinTask#fork() operations.

Author:
Niklas Schlimm

Method Detail

forkAndJoin

public abstract ComposableResult<?> forkAndJoin(List<DecomposableInput<?>> decomposedInput)
Subclasses implement this method to decide how to distribute processing of the decomposed input objects.

Parameters:
decomposedInput - the list of input objects to distribute across threads using ForkJoinTask#fork()
Returns:
a result of subtasks composed by using ForkJoinTask#join()
